description: I'm running Fedora 36 with KDE... Konqueror works great... It's like Dolphin plus more.
It's good. Many features you wouldn't normally have in a browser are found here.
When I try to view a folder, Konqueror send me to Dolphin.
summary: unable to work as file manager

description: To have this as a file manager and browser is fantastic with the split view. Great for getting things done. Everything seems to work, and I can see how the thinking in it can lead to great updates in the future! Like playing media files in it, viewing images etc...
Showed "authentication required" but no dialog windows to enter credentials.
summary: Did not work for me with DAV

description: Keeps opening multiple instances of the browser. Opened about 20 browsers once. Uninstalled

Compared to GNOME Web, its WebKit web engine is ancient. In a rapidly evolving world such as the web, this is not very good.

Also has very weird UX, and the UI looks pretty old for today's standards.
summary: Not up to date web engine, weird UX

description: I do not see any cases to use it istead of standart file manager.
when I enter a word that is not an address in the address bar it gives me an error, it is quite fast but it still has many errors in the interface and basic functionality, I hope it improves
this is built on chromium appearantly. no settings to adjust behaviour i could find. blocks local lan sites. imo a waste of time and disk space
summary: not useful as a browser to me

description:
As a file manager, Konqueror is an excellent and feature-rich application that, to me, tops dolphin in many respects. For example, the ability to divide view panes horizontally and vertically is priceless.

It is a shame that Konqueror seems to be paused in development. It's what Dolphin should have been.

Earlier this year, the devs of Konqueror finally got the memo and began to use Chromium as their browser layout engine. This finally makes this browser usable. It also includes uBlock compatible ad blocking filters. The only problem is how I sometimes see that toolbar changes don't apply or get reset.
crashes and can NOT be uninstalled normaly
summary: crashes and can NOT be uninstalled normaly

description: settings-->click config
I have used Konqueror for serious heavy tasks that can't be done on a lightweight web browser. My workflow is pretty basic. So it's nice to have it when you need it.
can't remove. worried about security

I really want to like Konqueror, from the old style UI to the focus on opening and viewing files to a settings menu that allows me to turn off cookies and etc, but this app has so many problems. Firstly, the aforementioned settings do not work, no matter what I did clicking on the option to remove cookies just wouldn't work. The undo button also is far too overzealous, not allowing me to, for example, return to a search I made in reddit when I inevitably use that search. The text on the home screen is very hard to read because of the choice of black colour overlayed the darker band of colour in the background. Better than Web that came with my Linux Mint by a mile, something I really do want to like, but I cant accept such a lackluster piece of software, even if the name of the game is probablly that it is open source.
Anwendung ist gut, aber startet immer automtisch beim start vom system und es lässt sich nicht abschalten. daher lösch ich es

Wer Konqueror auf Fedora 36 installiert erlebt ein Desaster. Denn sobald man Enstellungen verändert oder darauf arbeiten möchte, bricht Konquerors Fenster zusammen und ist unbrauchbar. Ob das mit Wayland zusammenhängt? Jedenfalls ist er so nicht zu gebrauchen. Schade
Hatte mich gefreut eine echte Alternative zu googleund firefox gefunden zu haben, aber leider öffnetdas Programm nicht. Werde es wieder löschen.
Ein Programm mit lauter Kästchen, Menüs, wo keine Befehle aktiv sind... Gleich wieder gelöscht diesen Schwachsinn!

Wenn man Kubuntu nutzt, funktioniert Konqueror in Verbindung mit Dolphin. Leider gehen nicht alle Internetseiten auf. Ansonsten sind die Möglichkeiten absolut toll, da man ihn auch als Dateimanager nutzen kann. Gut wäre wenn webdav integriert würde.
a veces no se graban los cambios, el bloqueador de anuncios no va siempre, aunque los selecciones todos.

It is really the only reason I have stuck with KDE all these years.
With the kio adons it is really a document manager. You can have set up sessions for different jobs with the folders and documents you need, much cleaner and faster than using "Activities".
Abstenerse cardiacos. No merece la pena.
Lo uso como una forma de aislar mi acceso a redes sociales, de lo que hago en otros navegadores.
Siempre me ha gustado muchisimo este navegador.
Très réactif mais un peu clunky (barre de menus et du bas non enlevables + je ne suis pas arriver à ajouter un bloqueur de pub.

ce navigateur donne son originalité à linux. les développeurs gagnerait s'associer avec mozilla pour ce qui est de la creation permettant à celui ci d'ajouter des extensions. il a du mal à lire des formats libres et repandus sur internet (vidéos ,PDF , images ... ) et à declencher des téléchragements sur certains site.

Hello !
Impossible d'effacer son historique de connexion.
Même après une désinstallation.
It's impossible to delete your connection history.
Even after uninstallation.

хороша ябыла бы программа, если бы:
был блокировщик рекламы
синхронизированный просмотр показывал не одну и ту же папку, а одну и ту же папку на разных рессурсах (local, Ftp)
передача файлов на удаленный рессурс производилась в несколько потоков как в FileZilla (сейчас 1 поток. неприемлемо медленно при большом количестве файлов)

一个基于Webenging和KHTML引擎的浏览器。Webkit的前身就是KHTML，很高兴KHTML还在更新。
